article_title: Kim Strassel: America Is ‘War on Women’ Weary
article_text:
Colorado Sen. Mark Udall has been called a lot of things, but the nickname highlighted during his Tuesday debate with Republican Cory Gardner deserves some meditation. “Mr. Udall,” said the female debate moderator, “your campaign has been so focused on women’s issues that you’ve been dubbed ‘Mark Uterus’ . . . Have you gone too far?”

Don’t tell Harry Reid, but the “war on women” theme is losing political altitude. Don’t tell the entire Democratic Party, in fact, which this year chose to elevate this attack—that...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Potomac Watch columnist Kim Strassel writes that a favorite Democratic tactic loses traction with voters.
twitter.title: America Is ‘War on Women’ Weary
